summary: Experienced Accountant with expertise in financial reporting, budgeting, grants accounting, and process improvements; proficient in SAP, PeopleSoft, macros, Excel; strong knowledge of GAAP and Sarbanes-Oxley compliance.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Accountant in the Experimental Therapeutics Research department; prepared grant and restricted/non-restricted financial reports; created financial models; prepared monthly PI reports; reconciled ncRNA Core monthly; assisted with effort reporting via EPAF system and expense transfers; assisted with operating budget; developed financial models for grants; monitored departmental transactions for policy compliance; liaised with Grants and Contracts; reviewed and close Open POs; analyzed financial systems; assisted with ILABS invoicing; developed a macro-enabled reconciliation template to reduce keying errors and increase efficiency; prepared training materials; completed special department projects.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Full-cycle accountant for several operating companies at Sysco Foods; produced and issued weekly, monthly, and quarterly financial statements; uploaded and ran reports in Business Objects; verified journal entries; prepared monthly P&L and analyzed variances; reviewed GL transactions for accuracy; reconciled aging AR; performed financial analysis; ensured GAAP compliance; supported internal and external auditors; reviewed reconciliations from other accountants.

experience.title: Accountant / Auditor
experience.description: Accountant and auditor in the Financial Services department; compiled, retrieved, and summarized accounting information for analysis and reporting; examined source documents for accuracy and compliance with rules and regulations; provided training on procurement card regulations; maintained records to ensure data accuracy; identified non-compliance and suggested process improvements; ensured GAAP, internal controls, and Sarbanes-Oxley compliance; reviewed expense reports and prepared adjusting and closing entries.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting
